knimeNode.name: GenerateConsensusSequence
knimeNode.shortDescription: GenerateConsensusSequence - extracts the consensus sequence out of an multiple sequence alignment

fullDescription.intro: GenerateConsensusSequence can be applied after SAM2BAM, or BAMLoader. It receives the path to samtools, to the alignment (BAM) file and to the reference (genome, fastA) sequence file and generates the consensus sequence in fastA format.

ports.inPort:
Cell 0: Path to SamTools
Cell 1: Path to the alignment BAM file
Cell 2: Path to the reference sequence file (FastA)
